I'm Scott killaby and I'm the director

addiction depression anxiety treatment

it's the first mindfulness based

it's really the first one here so we're

addiction and the part of that book
called the living inquiries which is a
form of self inquiry there's a lot of
other things that we do at the center
including yoga energy and bodywork some
DBT things like that but it's mainly
centered around the presence work and
the inquiry
